skdetail:

Invocation Name: gita quotes
des: Bhagavad Gita Quotes provides users with inspirational quotes from sacred book he Bhagavad Gita. The user can hear motivating and inspiring quotes throughout the day. The quotes are based on spiritual wisdom, karma and life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
